page.title: 18Local Places of Worship
page.content: There are four places of worship in our area. Trinity United Reform Methodist Chapel, and Florence Street Methodist Chapel whose Superintendant Minister is Mr. E Pritchard. He has lay preachers to help with the services. Rev. A.Matty is the vicar of Saint Saviour's C.of E. church. He has three curates to help him. Between 40 and 50 people attend church each Sunday. On Tuesdays there is a service for Mothers and toddlers. Mr. and Mrs. Swansbury are the Lieutenants in charge of the Salvation Army, they have a few local assistants. They hold five services during the course of a week including childrens' group meetings. About 50 people attend on Sundays, but as many as 150 go on special occasions. I go to their Sunday School at 1430. We sing, pray and work. Sometimes they take us out on trips.
